about_the_game:
🔥 Welcome to Battle Babes: Lightning! 🔥

Master the art of strategy with 7 powerful hero decks and over 600 distinctive cards, each brimming with unique magic, powers, and abilities. Dive into fast-paced, thrilling battles where cunning, luck, and skill determine your path to victory. Customize your decks to perfection and dominate in epic duels against challenging AI foes. Lead your Battle Babes to fame and glory—are you ready for the challenge?

Base Game (Free to Play):
Includes access to the following Hero Power Decks: Fire, Water, Nature

DLC 1: Battle Babes: Blood, Sun & Moon
Adds the Blood, Sun, and Moon Hero Power Decks.
(Includes all content from the base game.)

DLC 2: Lightning
Adds the Lightning Hero Power Deck.
(Includes all content from the base game and DLC 1.)

DLC 3: Love & Death
Adds the Love and Death Hero Power Decks.
(Includes all content from the base game, DLC 1, and DLC 2.)

DLC 4: Lust, Space & Shadow
Adds the Lust, Space, and Shadow Hero Power Decks.
(Includes all content from the base game and all prior DLCs.)

DLC 5: Wind, Frost & Astra
Adds the Wind, Frost, and Astra Hero Power Decks.
(Includes all content from the base game and all prior DLCs.)

DLC 6: Earth, Air & Ocean
Adds the Earth, Air, and Ocean Hero Power Decks.
(Includes all content from the base game and all prior DLCs.)

Each DLC builds upon the previous ones, giving you access to all prior content and expanding your strategic options. Choose the decks that suit your playstyle, and dominate the battlefield in style!

🌟 Key Game Features: 🌟

  • 7 Playable Hero Powers: Fire, Water, Nature, Blood, Sun, Moon & Lightning!
  • Battle 18 AI Hero Power Decks: Love, Death, Lust, Space, Shadow, Wind, Frost, Astra, Earth, Air, Ocean, and more for epic AI challenges!
  • Defeat Challenging AI Boss Decks: Dragon Clan & Succubus Queen. Earn Coins, Buy Card Packs. Collect 600+ Blessed Cards!
  • Dynamic Turn-Based Combat: Engage in electrifying battles, blending deep strategy with an element of chance.
  • Expansive Card Collection: Over 600+ unique cards featuring formidable babes, each with their special abilities and rich backstories.
  • Deck Customization: Tailor your deck with a diverse mix of babes, spells, secrets, and artifacts to outmaneuver your opponents.
  • Exquisite Artwork: Dive into a world of stunningly illustrated cards and breathtaking landscapes.
  • Frequent Updates & Events: Stay engaged with regular additions of new babes, challenges, and rewards.
  • Interactive Tutorials: New to card games? No problem! Our babes will guide you through the basics.
  • Beginner-Friendly: Learn the ropes with interactive guides, making it easy for newcomers to join the fun.
  • Play Solo: Practice against Advanced AI which shows no mercy.

🌌 Join the Battle Babes Universe: 🌌

  • Engaging Strategic Gameplay: Easy to learn, yet challenging to master – like mastering the art of walking in stilettos.
  • Regular Content Updates: New cards, new babes, new ways to conquer. We keep it fresh so you'll never get bored. Continuously evolving gameplay new hero powers and characters, keeping the experience fresh and thrilling.
  • Expanding Fantasy World: Regularly introduced new cards and characters ensure an ever-evolving battleground.
  • Battle Babes: A realm where sass meets class, elegance meets energy, artistry meets ambition, and competition meets camaraderie. Sharpen your skills, customize your decks, and engage in fierce battles.

Join the Battle Babes saga today and shape your path to glory!

Say hello to Battle Babes, the epic collectible card game that’s here to take over! Get ready to collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with the sassiest, most powerful babes in the realm.

Battle Babes, where fantasy, fun, and fierceness collide in a collectible card game like no other!

What are you waiting for? Don't make these babes wait!

name: Battle Babes: Lightning
short_description: Battle Babes is a fierce and fun single-player, turn-based strategy card game set in a vibrant fantasy world. Lead 7 powerful heroines, unleash 600+ magical cards, and craft your perfect deck. Customize your warrior princesses and outsmart AI foes in epic battles. Ready to claim your crown?
